name: STAINED (itch) (blooperss)
description:
Stained is a roughly thought out game with a base idea that's not fully thought out. It's VERY short for now and has little to offer, but it's still worth a shot. You play as an unnamed protagonist (for now) who's goal is to get into a mansion (the reason for this goal is not fully thought out.). I worked REALLY hard on this game, so I hope you enjoy what it's got so far. Anyway, that's all for now. 

P.S. Wouldn't it be cool if this got featured on one of either Markiplier or Jacksepticeye's 3 Scary Games videos? Maybe we can get this near the top of the horror tag list? Who knows?
